awesome game, glitchs here and there but the dev team is on a tight budget and doesnt have the best programmers. One of the best multiplayers out there, can be spooky, funny, or relaxing.

Was winning. Wifi went out. Was penalized for disconnecting. There is now a timer preventing me from playing. This game is super annoying and has the longest load times just to begin a match. This would be fun if the matches were fun but 90% of the time the matches are pretty toxic and full of high rank people that will either kill you within 2 minutes or make playing killer impossible and boring. Overall not worth it unless you have good friends to play with but even still this game will test your patience.
this game was made by brain-dead monkeys for brain-dead monkeys. fun if you suffer from brain damage but if you are of sound mind this game is nothing but pure torture

I like this game and its fun with friends but there are some points that can help to this game to be better... for example:
1.survivors should have a small map in left corner of screen
2.voice chat in game
3.some skins for Bill :D

love the general game play hook. Having different killers with varied attacks makes it an endless chance draw of challenging and surprising matches. Adding to that, all the heroes variations. Just wishing we would get a change of variation to the objectives. even changing what we are working on. instead of 5 generators, how about 5 computer terminals or 5 traps to effect the killer.
hitboxes were fixed but behaviour interactive is like the joseph kony of video game companies so i cant wait for the next shitass update
